name: Tokoro's Mahjong
overview: Tokoro's Mahjong is a mahjong game for the Super Nintendo featuring the Japanese comedian and musician George Tokoro (real name Takayuki Haga). It follows a series of Arcade games where Tokoro plays mahjong against a series of colorful characters. The game features a freeplay mode where the player selects their opponents. There is also a story mode that intermittently features mahjong games.
